skills.name: CATACOMB
desc: • Deals one hit of physical damage to a single target.
• Inflict Grievous Burn and Ignite on the target for 1 turn.
• 35% Chance to grant Perfect Accuracy to each ally for 2 turns.

skills.name: TEMPLE OF TOMBS
desc: • Grant Regen to all allies for 2 turns.
• Lower DEF of all enemies for 1 turn.
• Increase ATK of allies for 2 turns.
• 35% Chance to grant an Extra Turn to each ally.

skills.name: BEYOND THE GRAVE
desc: • Decrease the MAX HP of a random enemy by 5% every turn.
• Heal a random ally based on their MISSING HP every turn..
